title: He Was Shining With The Stars - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Older Love Interests   Revenge
author: Salted Egg Yolk   咸蛋黄
description:
After one night sleeping with him, she found he was her father’s sworn brother.

She tried to hide herself from him and meant to bury these filthy pasts deep in her heart, but ultimately failed to escape from the beautiful memories.

She loved him so much and so blindly that troubles found their way to her.

He disappeared, loved and married another woman. This regretless love fraud tortured her, so much so that he finally turned into the sharpest thorn in her heart.

She had love, and pain, but lost.

As long as she closed her eyes, the very tender look that he had when doting on her to the utmost came to her mind…>
